tool.name: ChangeUserSettings

param.name: Scratch_path
param.displayname: Scratch path (folder which will contain scratch geodatabases etc.)
param.dialogReference: Set the scratch path where intermediate files will be saved. It is recommended to place this on a local drive instead of a network drive or an external drive.

param.name: Developer_mode
param.dialogReference: Tick this box to enable developer mode which allows code changes to take effect immediately after saving without closing and reopening ArcMap.

param.name: Reset_all_settings
param.displayname: Reset all settings to their default values

tool.summary: Run this tool first to initialise the scratch path where intermediate files will be saved.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Run this tool first to initialise the scratch path where intermediate files will be saved.
